description: It requires plenty of water and fertile, well-drained soils,often grown in lowland areas, along riverbanks, or in paddy fields.
It requires well-drained, fertile soils and full sun and adequate rainfall. It can also be grown in areas with short dry seasons.
It require well-drained, sandy-loam soils and well-distributed rainfall. A drought-tolerant and can be grown as a rain-fed crop.
It require well-drained, fertile soils and adequate moisture. They are often grown in rotation with maize.
Drought-tolerant and grow well in a variety of soils, from sandy to clayey, as long as they are well-drained and places with moderate rainfall.

It require well-drained, sandy-loam soils and plenty of sunlight and often grown as a rotation crop with cereals such as maize.

It thrive in cool climates and are grown in the highlands. They require well-drained soil and moderate rainfall.
